description: Require high-confidence, high-evidence decisions. Suitable for critical choices where wrong answers are costly.

rules.name: minimum-confidence-threshold
rules.message: Decisions require minimum 80% confidence with high-signal-junctions
rules.suggestion: Gather more evidence or reduce option complexity

rules.name: require-multiple-evidence-sources
rules.message: At least 2 independent evidence sources required
rules.suggestion: Add evidence from additional sources to support decision

rules.name: evidence-freshness
rules.message: Evidence must be less than 24 hours old
rules.suggestion: Refresh stale evidence before making decision

rules.name: require-rationale
rules.suggestion: Add rationale explaining why this option was selected

min_evidence_sources.description: Minimum number of evidence sources required

max_evidence_age_hours.description: Maximum age of evidence in hours
